com.github.dylon.liblevenshtein.serialization

Class PlainTextSerializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.dylon.liblevenshtein.serialization.AbstractSerializer
      • com.github.dylon.liblevenshtein.serialization.PlainTextSerializer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializer

    public class PlainTextSerializer
extends AbstractSerializer
    (De)Serializer for plain text files. Dictionaries have their terms serialized to a newline-delimited, text file. Transducers are serialized to a plain text, property file.

    • Nested Class Summary

    • Field Detail

      • log

        @Generated(value="lombok")
private static final Logger log

      • isSorted

        private boolean isSorted
        Specifies that this PlainTextSerializer only deals with sorted collections. If you do not know whether the collections you'll be (de)serializing are sorted, you should leave this false.

      • serializer

        private final Serializer serializer
        Serializes SortedDawg dictionaries for Transducer, Properties files.
